channel.title: Newest Yocto YEPs
channel.description: Newest Yocto Enhancement Proposals (YEPs): Information on new language features and some meta-information like release procedure and schedules.

item.title: YEP 2: Backporting of SPDX 3 to Yocto 5.0 release branch
item.author: Joshua Watt

item.title: YEP 0: Index of Yocto Enhancement Proposals (YEPs)
item.description: This YEP contains the index of all Yocto Enhancement Proposals, known as YEPs. YEP numbers are assigned by the YEP editors, and once assigned are never changed. The version control history of the YEP texts represent their historical record.
item.author: The YEP Editors
